alert.note: Alert for Southern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 28 at 3:20PM EST until November 29 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches. Total snow accumulations 2 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Southern Herkimer County. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates may reach up to 1 inch per hour at times. Some blowing and drifting snow is possible with gusty winds. The highest snowfall amounts will likely stay just north of the New York Thruway.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
